EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to Pivotal Web Services
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
WELCOME TO PIVOTAL WEB SERVICES Welcome to the future of agile development! You can rapidly update and scale across multiple environments and let Pivotal Web Services maintain your app’s health in production. Your 60-day free trial starts NOW. Start (http://docs.run.pivotal.io/starting/) by pushing your first app
- Install the CF CLI (https://console.run.pivotal.io/tools)
- Run the following commands:
cf login -a api.run.pivotal.io git clone https://github.com/cloudfoundry-samples/spring-music cd spring-music/ ; ./gradlew assemble // use ./gradlew.bat on Windows cf push
See real-time log events (http://docs.run.pivotal.io/devguide/deploy-apps/streaming-logs.html):
cf apps // see your application’s name and URL cf logs spring-music
Scale out:
cf scale spring-music -i 2 cf app spring-music // verify two instances started
Add a database service (http://docs.run.pivotal.io/devguide/services/adding-a-service.html):
cf create-service cleardb spark spring-music-db cf bind-service spring-music spring-music-db cf push spring-music LOG IN NOW (https://console.run.pivotal.io) Questions? Email support@run.pivotal.io or post a question in our developer forums http://support.run.pivotal.io/.
cf push,
The Pivotal Web Services Team
